description: I like this app I just wish the defaults were set to american units if you live in the US
summary: Great app bad default units for US locations

description:
This is basically pretty good, but it does have its extremely odd points. I have it set by default to three locations in the UK, and I check it first thing in the morning and last thing at night. At night, usually only one of the locations is showing as dark (and it's not the one I'm in); occasionally none of them shows as dark; and rarely two of them do, but never all three.

I have a friend who is currently in Toronto, and he's weather-obsessed, so I added Toronto as a location. The forecast for Toronto for Thursday went from 27 degrees to 15 overnight. It's now 14... but then I looked at the temperature graph underneath, and that's still showing 27 for Thursday, so if my friend goes by this app he's not going to know whether he needs his shorts or his knitted beanie. There are other discrepancies, but that is the most dramatic.

At least according to the app it does get dark in Toronto... :-)

Really enjoy the look and weather detail this app provides. A decent selection of weather data sources as well. 

One minor nitpick is that the times shown for sunrise and sunset are shown in a 12HR time format, neither respecting the system setting or allowing a change to the format.

Installed from fedora source but does not launch. When trying to launch from terminal, it reports, kweather: symbol lookup error: kweather: undefined symbol: _ZNK12KWeatherCore19LocationQueryResult11subdivisionEv
Best wheater app on the store,
Like the app and the interface is quite pleasant.
This app works great on my KDE Neon install. It just works, and like the rest of Neon, it's modern and soothing.
summary: As always, KDE gets it done

description: Provides great information! Can see with a glance how temperatures are going to change day-by-day with the continuous line! Great--thanks again!
dark mode would make this absolutely perfect
summary: great app, but useless for me because no dark mode

description: I live in a small town in southern Utah. While the app works well, the closest place I could find was about 20 miles away, and over 1000 feet higher, so the weather isn't going to be the same. I had to find one that would give me a closer report.
summary: Seems to work well, but doesn't have town

description:
Alles ist sehr aufgeräumt und es gibt ein gutes Kompromiss zwischen Informationsmenge und Übersichtlichkeit.

Die Anwendung sieht so aus und funktioniert sehr ähnlich wie die ursprüngliche Wetteranwendung von Windows 10 (bevor Werbung und lauter unübersichtliche Gimmicks die kaum jemand brauch dazugefügt wurden). Und ich meine das als ein Kompliment, weil ich diese sehr gut fand!

Das einzige was ich vermisse ist eine Angabe der Niederschlagswahrscheinlichkeit.

Mainly designed for mobile devices but can be used on a desktop, too.
The weather is precise and the app is made very well. The design look clean, too.
Intuitiva, hace lo que tiene que hacer, información precisa y entendible.
Otras no cogen los municipios pequeños, esta va perfecta.
Хорошее приложение, но не могу переключить оформление с плоского на динамическое. Также текст закрывает друг друга.
Локализовано на русский язык не до конца
